lines:
CAMP DUMMER, 
PLUM ISLAND,

MASS.

the

1909 Seid did

M

Currena ham 
u luk

The par un 
A: 2. Steama Paisal Yuly 21, 190 milaquin

hal baru nalla 
Phillips Andor Academy pould boy to get a

Andorr, Maci touchentikan

I write m oder to 
call to your attention the fact that M. Suk 
has not yet arrived at our camp. Ite engaged 
with your consent as guardian, to be here ing the 
fifteenth of July at the latest he has not only 
not arrivid but has seul is no word an Elena 
of his delay. In point of fact we are not soen 
informed as to his where abeta.

We should, Therefore, be greatly ableged to 
you if you would take the trouble to red 
Chim if his Engagement and to urge upon her 
the need of coming at once, if he is to accomplish 
Planned for the summer.

Your Sincerely,

Wiltumingham

y com

the lo
raw: CAMP DUMMER, PLUM ISLAND, MASS. the 1909 Seid did M Currena ham u luk The par un A: 2. Steama Paisal Yuly 21, 190 milaquin hal baru nalla Phillips Andor Academy pould boy to get a Andorr, Maci touchentikan I write m oder to call to your attention the fact that M. Suk has not yet arrived at our camp. Ite engaged with your consent as guardian, to be here ing the fifteenth of July at the latest he has not only not arrivid but has seul is no word an Elena of his delay. In point of fact we are not soen informed as to his where abeta. We should, Therefore, be greatly ableged to you if you would take the trouble to red Chim if his Engagement and to urge upon her the need of coming at once, if he is to accomplish Planned for the summer. Your Sincerely, Wiltumingham y com the lo

metadata.name: Phillips Academy
metadata.abstract: Letter from W.H. Cunningham, Master of  Dummer Acstating that S.C. Luk had not yet arrived at summer camp, having promised to arrive by July 15th. There has been no communication from Luk. He asks Stearns to inform Luk of his obligation to his studies at camp.
metadata.collection: Head of School (Stearns) correspondence with Chinese alumni
